text_html: Via Elna Moolman @StandardBankZA S&P’s rating on foreign currency debt equates SA with Oman, Vietnam, Paraguay, Georgia & Serbia. A notch downgrade makes SA's peers Bolivia, Brazil, Greece, Dom. Republic, Honduras, Fiji, Bangladesh, North Macedonia, Uzbekistan & Guatemala

text:
S&P's assessment of SA:

- acknowledges gains in "restoring the credibility of SA's weakened institutions" including NPA & SARS

- but so far only sees “limited” reforms to bolster growth and fix fiscal problems

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says:

The winter has been long, but we must prepare for spring and reposition the Republic to grow and to thrive. We need to plant good seeds for our country, both now and for future generations.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: The winter has been long, but we must prepare for spring and reposition the Republic to grow and to thrive. We need to plant good seeds for our country, both now and for future generations.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says:

Through  reprioritisation, the National Prosecuting Authority receives an additional R1.3 billion. 

NB --- This only matters if it = jail time for public and private sector white-collar criminals
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: Through reprioritisation, the National Prosecuting Authority receives an additional R1.3 billion. NB --- This only matters if it = jail time for public and private sector white-collar criminals

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

I am pleased to learn that there are conversations involving SAA and potential equity  partners,  which  would liberate the fiscus  from  this SAA sword of Damocles.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: I am pleased to learn that there are conversations involving SAA and potential equity partners, which would liberate the fiscus from this SAA sword of Damocles.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

Eskom is a business and should be run that way.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: Eskom is a business and should be run that way.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

We  cannot  continue  to  throw  money  at  Eskom.  

Eskom must:

- run plant & equipment better
- achieve efficiencies
- fast track the separation of the utility

There  should  be  no  doubt  about  the policy decisions in this regard.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: We cannot continue to throw money at Eskom. Eskom must: - run plant & equipment better - achieve efficiencies - fast track the separation of the utility There should be no doubt about the policy decisions in this regard.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

- Cabinet, Premiers & MECs’ salaries will be frozen
- The cost of official cars will be capped at R800 000
- All domestic travel will be on economy class tickets
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: - Cabinet, Premiers & MECs’ salaries will be frozen - The cost of official cars will be capped at R800 000 - All domestic travel will be on economy class tickets

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

After   adjusting   for   inflation,  the average government wage has risen by 66% in the last 10 years.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: After adjusting for inflation, the average government wage has risen by 66% in the last 10 years.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

On our current trajectory, by the end of the three-year framework, debt service costs will be bigger than spending on health and economic development.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: On our current trajectory, by the end of the three-year framework, debt service costs will be bigger than spending on health and economic development.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

Honourable members, there is no status quo option!

Stabilisation involves difficult decisions that imply sacrifices by all of us.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: Honourable members, there is no status quo option! Stabilisation involves difficult decisions that imply sacrifices by all of us.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

The consolidated budget deficit is now projected at 5.9 per cent of GDP & national debt will most likely exceed 70 per cent of GDP by 2022/23.
 
This is a serious position to be in.

Clearly, we need to do things differently.
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: The consolidated budget deficit is now projected at 5.9 per cent of GDP & national debt will most likely exceed 70 per cent of GDP by 2022/23. This is a serious position to be in. Clearly, we need to do things differently.

text:
In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: 

Just   like   Eliud   Kipchoge,   the   Kenyan   economy   is   racing   ahead.   Growth is expected  to  be  6% ...  In  Ghana,  growth is expected to be 7.5%. Ethiopia will grow by over 7%. 

They clearly have new shoes. Why don’t we?
text_html: In delivering the #MTBPS Mboweni says: Just like Eliud Kipchoge, the Kenyan economy is racing ahead. Growth is expected to be 6% ... In Ghana, growth is expected to be 7.5%. Ethiopia will grow by over 7%. They clearly have new shoes. Why don’t we?

A history lesson for people who think that history doesn't matter:
What's the big deal about railroad tracks?
The US standard railroad gauge (distance between the rails) is 4 feet, 8.5 inches. That's an exceedingly odd number.
Why was that gauge used?
Well, because that's the waypic.twitter.com/oNxWuJ4TAl

text:
Philippines is increasingly becoming an important WHEAT market. It's now the world’s third-largest wheat importer, with imports more than doubling since 2013/14 as food and feed demand soar alongside its expanding population and economy.

The "colour bar" shows the suppliers.pic.twitter.com/rdr0ua7CZq

text:
Scrip div: there will be no tax payable on receipt. When the shares are sold the cost base will be nil, hence tax will crystallize at that point.

Dividend reinvestment: tax will be payable in full (either DWT or income tax if a REIT). Cost base will be the pre-tax value of div.https://twitter.com/mike19461117/status/1172047681520373761 …
